keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Tourism threatens to destroy one of Italy’s most historic cities. The United Nations has issued a stern warning.

headline.print_headline: Can We Save Venice Before It’s Too Late?
headline.main: Can We Save Venice Before It’s Too Late?

snippet: Tourism threatens to destroy one of Italy’s most historic cities. The United Nations has issued a stern warning....
abstract: Op-Ed article by Louvre Museum executive Salvatore Settis calls on Italy to do more to protect Venice, which has been placed on United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization's World Heritage in Danger list; holds city's economy must be diversified from tourism monoculture that threatens its social fabric, cohesion and civic culture.
